faq_add_bill: How do I add a new bill?
faq_add_bill_answer: You can add a new bill by going to the 'Upload Bills' page, then either manually upload a bill document or import it from your email. The app will automatically extract relevant information.
faq_reminders_answer: You can set up custom reminders for each bill with your preferred timing. Reminders can be received via push notifications, email, or SMS based on your preferences in the Profile settings.
faq_data_safe_answer: Yes, your data is stored securely and is not shared with any third parties. We use encryption to protect sensitive information and you can delete your data at any time from the Profile page.
faq_export: Can I export my bill data?
faq_export_answer: Yes, you can export your bill data in CSV format from the History page. This allows you to keep a backup of your records or analyze them in external applications.
faq_delete: How do I delete my data?
faq_delete_answer: You can delete all your data from the Profile page under 'Data Settings'. This will remove all bills, reminders, and personal settings from our system.
faq_languages_answer: BillEase currently supports English, Hindi, Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, and Malayalam. You can change your language preference in the Profile page.
